de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.visor.monitoring

Interface Sensor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSensor, CpuUsageSensor, MemoryUsageSensor

    public interface Sensor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Measurement getMeasurement()
      Called to retrieve a measurement from this probe.
      void init()
      Initializes the sensor.
      void setMonitorContext(MonitorContext monitorContext)
      Sets the monitor context for the sensor.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
   throws SensorInitializationException
        Initializes the sensor.

        This e.g. allows the sensor to install dependencies for the operating system, or allows the sensor to configure itself for the current environment.

        Throws:
        SensorInitializationException - for problems during the initialization

      • setMonitorContext

        void setMonitorContext(MonitorContext monitorContext)
                throws InvalidMonitorContextException
        Sets the monitor context for the sensor.

        Tells the sensor the context in which it is running.

        Parameters:
        monitorContext - context of the sensor.
        Throws:
        InvalidMonitorContextException - if the monitor context is not valid.

      • getMeasurement

        Measurement getMeasurement()
                    throws MeasurementNotAvailableException
        Called to retrieve a measurement from this probe.
        Returns:
        the current measurement for this probe.
        Throws:
        MeasurementNotAvailableException
